sections.heading: What are Even and Odd Numbers?
items: An even number can be arranged in pairs without any leftovers.
An odd number is one more than a collection of pairs.

steps: Step 1: Identify if a number is even or odd.
Step 2: Determine if the number of numbers added is even or odd.
Step 3: Consider the parity of the sum.

sections.text: Adding any even number of odd numbers will result in an even number, but adding an odd number of odd numbers will result in an odd number.
